Equipment.name: USB_HUB
Equipment.description: Equipment used to activate and deactivate usb port

Parameter.name: HostDUTPortNumber
Parameter.description: USB Port Number used to link the DUT to the host

Parameter.name: ProductId
Parameter.description: Product identifier of the USB hub for enumeration

Parameter.name: VendorId
Parameter.description: Vendor identifier of the USB hub for enumeration

Parameter.name: Bus
Parameter.description: [optional] Bus is used to discriminate 2 hub with same {ProductId, VendorId}
